sentence: Thus, in an attempt to bring our field closer to a shared approach to describing faculty or other populations in HPE, we present a template (Fig. 1), which we propose researchers and educators can use when describing participants in a faculty-related role.
This template maintains the existing practice we saw of using a term to describe research participants and another which further qualifies that term (see Fig. 1).

Site/institution can be: University name, clerkship location (e.g. ward, operating theatre)Based on this template (Fig. 1), a completed example in the methods section of a paper might read as follows:
We included 711 full-time physicians who act as course coordinators for third year medical students at The University of The West Indies.

Thus, in an attempt to bring our field closer to a shared approach to describing faculty or other populations in HPE, we present a template (Fig. 1), which we propose researchers and educators can use when describing participants in a faculty-related role.
This template maintains the existing practice we saw of using a term to describe research participants and another which further qualifies that term (see Fig. 1).

Site/institution can be: University name, clerkship location (e.g. ward, operating theatre)Based on this template (Fig. 1), a completed example in the methods section of a paper might read as follows:
We included 711 full-time physicians who act as course coordinators for third year medical students at The University of The West Indies.

Thus, in an attempt to bring our field closer to a shared approach to describing faculty or other populations in HPE, we present a template (Fig. 1), which we propose researchers and educators can use when describing participants in a faculty-related role.
This template maintains the existing practice we saw of using a term to describe research participants and another which further qualifies that term (see Fig. 1).
Based on this template (Fig. 1), a completed example in the methods section of a paper might read as follows:.
